LanguageData.DRNTF_NooseTrap.label: Noose Trap
LanguageData.DRNTF_NooseTrap.description: It is Kurin's special noose trap which can be made quickly with less material. When you activate the trap, the lasso ties the enemy. But it does not work for too big enemies and mechanoid.
LanguageData.DRNTF_NooseTrap_Blueprint.label: Noose Trap (blueprint)
LanguageData.DRNTF_NooseTrap_Blueprint_Install.label: Noose Trap (blueprint)
LanguageData.DRNTF_NooseTrap_Frame.label: Noose Trap (building)
LanguageData.DRNTF_NooseTrap_Frame.description: It is Kurin's special noose trap which can be made quickly with less material. When you activate the trap, the lasso ties the enemy. But it does not work for too big enemies and mechanoid.
